meanings.definition: The action of admitting someone into a secret or obscure society or group, typically with a ritual.
meanings.sent1: The initiation into the club involved a special ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The initiation into the secret society was shrouded in mystery.
meanings.sent3: The initiation ceremony had everyone wearing funny hats.
meanings.sent4: The initiation felt like stepping into a whole new world.
meanings.sent5: The initiation process left a lasting impression on me.

meanings.sent1: The initiation of the project marked a new chapter for the team.
meanings.sent2: The initiation of the race signaled the start of the competition.
meanings.sent3: The initiation of the game brought excitement to the players.
meanings.sent4: The initiation of the journey filled them with anticipation.
meanings.sent5: The initiation of the plan set everything in motion.
